description: Downloaded it. Not exactly straight forward on how it works. It's either broke and not exactly user friendly.
I thought it's a VPN, but nothing working. No instruction for how to use.
if you think this is a vpn go back to page 1 and learn Networking. if you dont know how this works try Youtube.
Kovri project found many vulnerabilities, the protocol is not anonymous, bootstrapping can prevent anyone from joining.

Some instructions might be useful - Your website doesn't seem to have much, or maybe I just missed it?
Wanna try, but it's useless without being connected to the rest of the decentralized network ... Just saying.
summary: How to Bootstrap with a Trusted Source?

description: I think being findable by searching for vpn is a mistake (especially with no vpn software available in Gnome Software). This resulted so far in bad reviews and bad user experience, while the software itself is hardly to blame.
summary: should not have vpn in keywords
